member.name: T:PolyfillsForOldDotNet.System.Runtime.InteropServices.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:PolyfillsForOldDotNet.System.Runtime.InteropServices.Resources.Strings.Culture
